body: For around 13-14 hours stats have been "calculating" on my profile but after an hour wait still nothing has happened. I was online yesterday and killed several people but my stats never counted, why not?
body_tagged: For around 13-14 hours stats have been "calculating" on my profile but after an hour wait still nothing has happened. I was online yesterday and killed several people but my stats never counted, why not?
title: Stats on profile

replies.body: use avicus.net/yhate/stats it's a bug, every new player got it. Report it on Github and it'll be fixed in some hours...https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues
